website_summaries.verdict: The LG Stylo 3 is an affordable phablet for Boost Mobile users with solid performance and a useful built-in stylus.

customer_reviews.title: OMG I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this phone. Its large enough to watch a movie in my bed. But I dont uae it for that...I use it for work as an app independent contractor. And man it cured the slow wait of working several apps together by providing a smooth and timeless functionalty that makes me enjoy delivering food and showing to my house cleaning appointments without the worry of the phone freaking out. Awesome LG!!! And good riddens to my slow HTC Desire 530 phone with Metro PCS.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I had the Stylo 2 and this is basically the same phone but better. Nearly every complaint I had about the Stylo 2 was addressed and fixed. It's just what a company should do when releasing a new version of a phone. Keep what works and fix what doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The video and sound is excellent. Battery life is excellent also last me the whole day on one charge.
customer_reviews.author: bigdchiwawa

customer_reviews.title: Beward of pre-loaded apps!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the phone, but there are way, way, way too many apps which come pre-loaded!! The storage for those apps use up over half of the total internal storage of phone. The worst part is that many of those apps I have no interest in, but they're connected to some other operating part of the system. Otherwise, the phone is easy to read, nice size, takes very clear pictures and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone with a fingerprint scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. It arrived quickly and runs very fast. I'm very happy with it. It performs like a flagship & at a fraction of the price. Yeah I wish it had a 1080p screen for VR, or an extended battery for it, but those aren't deal breakers. PS you can move almost ANY app to the SD card if you go into "Developer Options" and tick "Force allow all apps to SD card". Waiting patiently on root, I'll update this review if root is available or if I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets on my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone! Im ussually a samsung person but i just dont believe in paying $600 for a phone so i tried this LG Stylo 3 and its amazing for its price. I love the screen size and its so much easier to type compared to a small phone. Takes awesome pics and battery life is fantastic! Great for a reader also. My only con is I wish the emojis were a bit more updated. Other than that I reccomend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK WITH BOOST
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone after my screen cracked. I waited to switch over because I was doing a lot of home reno work and didn't want to crack my new phone. When I did finally try to switch the phone would not work with my Boost Mobile service.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Camera doesn't take good pictures. But this is an AWESOME phone otherwise!! I really like the fingerprint sensor. It looks like an expensive phone, but the price is great! I highly recommend Boost Mobile as well. I've been with them for 3 years and have no complaints. $52 a month with unlimited talk, text, data...and insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: A big improvement over my last LG Stylo
customer_reviews.text: My previous phone was an earlier version of the LG Stylo. I got broad coverage but the phone did not have enough ROM. Virtually all the memory was taken up by the operating system and built-in apps. Some apps would not move to an SD card and if I could move them, that would slow things down. I did not like the hassle of figuring out which apps I could safely delete. This version has double the ROM and much more available space, a sharper stylus tip for greater precision, and introduces fingerprint unlocking.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: This smart phone has a fast computer chip
customer_reviews.text: This smart phone has a fast computer chip, large bright screen, the latest Android software (which is easier to use), very good battery life (and it is a replaceable battery - my previous experience with a non-replaceable battery was not good!), a good camera, and was very easy to set up right out of the box without phone store help. At $130 this was a great buy! I agree with the other good reviews on Amazon! I am pleased with my decision to buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice phone and very fast internet
customer_reviews.text: I'm first time user of the Stylo brand. This is a very nice phone and very fast internet. Just be careful they don't tell you that you can't take out the battery it'll break. The mobile carry won't refund your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I Love my  Style3
customer_reviews.text: I Love my phone, organizes my schedule, catches my calls and emails Works like a horse and saves me a lot of headaches.
customer_reviews.author: W. JORDAN

customer_reviews.title: Thinking about Stylo 3?
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone. Two issues though, the screen still gets dirty with a stylus, and need more RAM and ROM! Otherwise it's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade from LG Stylo 2
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed major improvements over my LG Stylo 2 in CPU heavy tasks (My work app has a signature function, but it was laggy on the Stylo 2 but is much smoother with the improved CPU)
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stover

customer_reviews.title: Phone was stolen per Boost Mobile.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy. When I called to activate the phone, the representative said it had been reported as lost or stolen. Completely useless. So don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: J.Blair

customer_reviews.title: THE PHONE CANT BE ACTIVATED
customer_reviews.text: The phone I purchased will not allow me to make calls or send texts. The phone is saying that it is locked.. I am now without a phone and am expecting important work calls. This is just great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at a fraction of the cost of an iPhone or Galaxy
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Expensive phones beware
customer_reviews.text: This phone was an emergency replacement for a samsung. I kept it. Not wasting hundreds when this phone is thin large screen.. stylus & works great. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: di

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone
customer_reviews.text: The camera doesn't take too great of pictures indoors and video of events looks good but the sound quality is awful as every other phone I've had is the same way. Also, the phone keeps alerting me it needs a system update but the update fails on a regular basis. My best friend has the same phone and it does the same to her.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: The phone was supposed to be the Stylo 3 for boost, it was an Amazon warehouse deal and I could tell from the package it had been opened but other than that it looked ok, however when I took it to be activated it was not Boost. The box was from Boost the phone was not.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndrella

customer_reviews.title: ... the Stylo 2 and this phone is just a better version!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Stylo 2 and this phone is just a better version!
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyJo17

customer_reviews.title: ... more internal memory than my prior phone which is good. As a smart phone it's functioning adequately
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot more internal memory than my prior phone which is good. As a smart phone it's functioning adequately. You get what you pay for, and I'm cool with that. However, the headphone input/jack is loose. I've tried two different wired earbuds, and both plugs keep slipping out of the jack. Very loose. That's irritating to me since I like my music when I'm working out. I'm reviving one of my old mp3 players to use at the gym. Again, I went with budget and will live with its shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: Been a while since I've had an LG phone. I like this one. A good mid-range budget phone that I have yet to find a complaint about. I will say, I did not get a stylist with it though. While I would never use it, it is advertised as something I would get. Just saying! But I still recommend this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Cellphone had Many ISSUES.
customer_reviews.text: The locked-screen fingerprint verification takes multiple attempts. This problem is also present when attempting to double-tap for a screenshot. The online manual is frustrating. But, overall, this is a decent cellphone. Update: Phone was schizophrenic. Too many issues. Replaced it not long after original review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional Unit
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the phone to unlock and load onto Virgin Mobile. Virgin Mobile had to send me a new phone after throughly testing the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm very happy with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this phone. It has a bigger screen than my old LG model which is nice. But the picture is not quite as crisp it is still nice. The stylus pen works well even with a screen protector on it although I rarely use it. Over all I would recommend this phone to a friend or family and would buy again. Edit.... Memory space could be larger but a assume an SD card will help with that. Will be in my next Amazon order for sure
customer_reviews.author: jacob h.

customer_reviews.title: Great low budget phone.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for the price. I'm very pleased with it. Lots of nice features including one that is not listed to my knowledge. It has a radio tuner that with a free app download you can listen to local stations without using any data or Wi-Fi. Also, the battery life is about 2 days average.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie crowder

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful running systems,the app starter does not load and have to continually push the button to load. the lg stylo 2 is superior. I had that one, i highly recommend that instead! My carrier is boost mobile.
customer_reviews.author: PIGPAUL

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone just didn't realize it came with screen protector. I ordered another one. Very happy with my new phone
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: LG Stylo 3 perks.
customer_reviews.text: Love my lg 3 even more than I did my LG 2!!!!! Nice and lightweight has great features and an incredible camera. One of my favorite things is the reminder to pop your stylus back in once you have reached a certain distance away from it with the phone. The screen is very sensitive but I adjusted to that with no problem. The only real complaint is that the home button often interfere with the command keys in the photo gallery. So far thenLG stylo is the phone to have for me.
customer_reviews.author: MacAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Nice big screen, leaves about 7 gigabytes of storage initially. Thin, lightweight. Great android phone. No sense spending $600 on a phone just get this one.
customer_reviews.author: HAPHnHAFF

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!! Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. I am so happy I upgraded from the LG Stylo 2. This phone has an amazing finger sensor, amazing front and back camera(I'm a photography), a big 5.7" screen, great accessibility for when your busy or one handed, overall amazing!
customer_reviews.author: savannah busby

customer_reviews.title: Its nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, its fast and the screen is very reactive... Buuuuuuut the aux port decided to stop working 4 months after owning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade for budget minded folks
customer_reviews.text: Love my new phone. Big.bright.long battery life. Fingerprint sensor it's awesome. Plenty of memory. Fast working. Definitely get a good case and screen protector on here! Protect your investment!
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the money. Can't beat the value. Virgin mobile plans are excellent value but data connection can be slow. Wish phone had 32 gigs but acceptable with sd card.
customer_reviews.author: RichV

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Best phone. Its been 5 months and its holding up very well
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone, but should be better because of the price?
customer_reviews.text: Its an amazing phone that I am honestly so happy to have. But 1. Sometimes my screen freezes and I have to lock and unlock the screen 3-4 times before i fix it. 2. The fingerprint "lock/unlock" doesnt always work. Thoes are my only issues. Besides that its an amazing phone. Ps. And about the screen freezing I HAVE NOT dropped it, or even got it wet AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Chan

customer_reviews.title: one of the best phones I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: one of the best phones I have ever purchased. getting used to using the stylus. Very useful and excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: I like the placement of the volume buttons better on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from the LG Stylo 2, spec wise its a decent improvement and noticable while playing resource heavy games. I like the placement of the volume buttons better on the 3 but preferred the stylus location of the 2. Overall it was a good buy and worth it purely for the fingerprint security.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I wish it didn't have all those app ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I wish it didn't have all those app that are just part of the operating system, 16GB these days are not enough if you don't get an SD.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good phone over all
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and hady phone Bought as replacement for previous nroken one. Still working good
customer_reviews.author: Caballero Pegaso

customer_reviews.title: ... the flagship phone this was without a doubt the best option on the market
customer_reviews.text: For someone who can't afford the flagship phone this was without a doubt the best option on the market. The LG Stylo 3 is so fast, clear, and lightweight. It's extremely light! I thought it was a fake when I opened the package. The delivery service was extremely fast as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone ever.
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I have had so far. Ad a micro sd card and you are good to go. I've had mine for over a year with no issues at all. I highly recommend this Lg Stylo 3.
customer_reviews.author: Tonster

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing for the eye and the hand
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pleased with this, but it really doesn't take much . . . It's large and took some getting used to, but it is a good upgrade. He uses this phone with Boost Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: L. McEntire

customer_reviews.title: Phone not working
customer_reviews.text: 1 of the phones that I purchase is not working I took the phone to a boost mobile store and they said the speaker was out I bought this phone for my 78 year old mother. I would like to exchange it please
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price, delivers efficient performance and clear/wide screen. Got mine for virgin mobile plan
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela M.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I was not happy about was that they couldn't send it to my p.o. box, it had to be sent to my physical address which is an apartment and packages seem to grow legs around here often!
customer_reviews.author: Jena B.

customer_reviews.title: Battery useage is poor
customer_reviews.text: Overall i like the phone. Nice big screen and a decent camera. So far my only complaint is battery life, from 100% to 20% in less than 3 hours.. Luckily this phone does have a removable battery so it is replacable! Major plus
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my LG STYLO 3 cellphone... A chip in the body of the phone...as well as NO STYLUS PEN! Am ordering a pen to replace the missing one. Also....a CLEARANCE STICKER ON BOX...$64.98.. ? Charged $125.00.... NOT HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So far the phone is working fine. The volume button has a hair trigger so ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone is working fine. The volume button has a hair trigger so contstantly turning up by mistake.
customer_reviews.author: scs

customer_reviews.title: love my phone
customer_reviews.text: love my phone, like the notepad where it stays very light on screen all day on the phone always
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not cool..
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone but it did not come with the stylus......Not cool....
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Virgin schmirgin
customer_reviews.text: Ran into some perplexing problems when and after I activated the particular phone. Spent countless hours on the phone with Virgin mobile and their foreign reps (English not so good). Trying to get help was fruitless. Almost changed carriers and had to buy another phone. Finally took a frieds advice and used a downloadable app to circumvent the problem. I was and still am greatly upset woth there lack of troubleshooting ability and concern. Supervisors did not return calls as promised. Been with Virgin mobile over 5 years and this shoddy customer dis- service will cause me to seek a better more responsive carrier once this phone needs replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for 10 months, performs well, zero problems. Use it every day. Camera is OK, not great but for my purposes this phone is a great value and I have been happy w/ Boost (love the unlimited streaming).
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Screen is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Screen is terrible and very very expensive to repair. You might as well buy a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Not much diffrence from the stylo 2..
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. But i dont find really anything much diff from the stylo 2 but the cost. Plus is the fingerprint password it has.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn kulhanek

customer_reviews.title: Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this phone except talking on it. The only way I can speak to anyone is when the phone is on speaker. Cannot understand anything when I put phone to my ear.
customer_reviews.author: lvlady

customer_reviews.title: Blown speaker
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast great phone only problem is too many ads even when i am not on line when i am trying to make a call it comes on and the speaker is blown so i use blue tooth
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine h.

customer_reviews.title: ... 'talk' my test messages in my 2017 Hyundai Tucson like my windows phone had before
customer_reviews.text: My only negative comment is it did not 'talk' my test messages in my 2017 Hyundai Tucson like my windows phone had before. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only had the phone a few months & it stop working it will not come on
customer_reviews.author: jemiah davis

customer_reviews.title: Large Screen for easy viewing.
customer_reviews.text: You can't put certain apps on the homescreen. Also when you put the speaker on for listening, it's muffled sound coming from the speaker. After all that, it's not too bad a phone.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: LG has impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far best LG phone I have ever owned love the stylus option, the finger print lock is rether impressive. All in all i love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm really enjoying my new phone I had the lg ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying my new phone I had the lg stylo lg stylo 2 and now the 3 and this phone definitely exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone! Its so bright and clear and my games look amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Stumblelina74

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Still trying out the features, It didn't come with instructions but I was able to find them on-line and customer service was able to help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The phone works gr8 luck up and got a boost sim from store the only one he had left everything works great thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Brooks Jr

customer_reviews.title: Definately like the larger memory
customer_reviews.text: Works well though slow sometimes. Not sure if it's the phone or not. Definately like the larger memory.
customer_reviews.author: skwurl

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've had yet. Long battery life. Tons of storage space. Only small problem is that the phone is so thin and more fragile than most, I suggest buying a case for it as soon as buying the phone
customer_reviews.author: susan fife

customer_reviews.title: Stylo 3
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Really can't go wrong with it. You will need to expand the memory with an sd card so go ahead and purchase it with the phone
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone do not buy one
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two stylo 3's and thru Amazon and both have crashed on me without any signs of trouble they work well in the beginning but both have failed within a year the last one in seven months I will never purchase one again bad product do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very cool phone for the price... I've owned Stylos 1,2,and 3... They never disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Keyon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Competes with the expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. All the functions are crisp. Love love the 13 mp camera. Photos are wonderful. Large screen for viewing my photos and vids. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natisa

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone and the fast internet
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone and the fast internet , coverage , reliability ! This phone has fingerprint recognition to turn on fast and all the bells and whistles I need. You can multi-task easy including a split screen .I can do 5 things at same time on this phone and never slow down.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone.. Me and my son are enjoying our new Stylo 3 phones, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Stylo 3
customer_reviews.text: It's a new stylo type phone, one advancement is that for some reason it seems to require you texts messages and messenger to merge and that is an option I could live without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Prefect if you can handle big phones. Excellent screen, for games, movies, and such. Has great sound quality, and is easy to use. Stylus is very very convient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite phone  yet!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. The screen resolution is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby (Tantalizing Reviews)

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Buy this phone from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Great for the money. Amazon saved me $30! I highly recommend this LG! Easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: gck1955

customer_reviews.title: I love the phone for monthly services ready to use out the box
customer_reviews.text: The ram memory sucks it fills to fast for me a heavy mobile gamer
customer_reviews.author: Steven g.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I love this phone. Screen is large and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: robert klug

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It's fast, very long battery life, handy stylus with quick notes built-in app, very light weight, and good external audio. Only downside is 16GB of storage just isn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone. I only wish I didn't have so many unlock screens to get into my phone. And the advertising I can do without.
customer_reviews.author: Debra O.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pretty happy with this purchase so far, haven't had any of the problems i've had with my previous LG phones. Will update when I've had it more than a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone with a lot of features.
customer_reviews.text: So far,it's quite a bit better than the Stylo 2.

customer_reviews.title: Boost mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: Stylus is fun and it's a great replacement phone for anyone on the boost network

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Works well. Big screen. My son loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this phone that long and it started clitching first Cou po le of weeks freezing don't waste your money looking for another one now

customer_reviews.title: From iPhone back to Android
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and I’m in love! I will miss my iPhone but who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Victavia Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best phone
customer_reviews.text: Love the stylus because my fingers never hit the key. Audio and picture quality are great. Recommendation get this phone.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone for the money, I was so impressed, I've bought four, one for myself, my wife, and both my children.

customer_reviews.title: not a bad camera. Grest phone for the
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, not a bad camera. Grest phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN TOMASELLO

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it has loads of memory and is very fast to load pages and aurf the web and perfect for watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Greatest phone I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with any stylo yet and way cheaper then all the high end phones that do the samething.
customer_reviews.author: Larry McClure

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone. Very annoyed that i didn't get stylus ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Very annoyed that i didn't get stylus pen.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer battery life
customer_reviews.text: The battery could use a longer life-everything else is up to par, thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I ordered it a month ago and it's handling well. Wish I would've recieved the case I ordered though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best of the four phones that i have had...a good phone all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Berry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i am satisfied with the bigger screen the amount of gb and quality of phone for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: soledad

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. I switched over from the X Power cause I needed the stylus for taking notes during class.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

product_meta.title: LG Stylo 3 - Prepaid - Carrier Locked - Virgin Mobile
product_meta.description: Style:Virgin MobileThe LG Stylo 3 for Virgin Mobile is perfect for work and play, the LG Stylo 3 features a stunning 5.7-Inch HD IPS display. Control apps, documents, and even take handwritten notes using the enhanced interactive stylus. Capture stunning photos with a 13MP camera. Adjust volume, snap photos and access capture+, using LG’s signature rear keys. Phone is for use with Virgin Mobile service only in the United States. Phone requires activation with Virgin Mobile and a Monthly rate plan starting at $35 a month.
feature_bullets: 13MP rear facing Camera/5MP front facing Camera

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars541 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: LG Stylo 3 handset, embedded stylus, battery, charger, USB cable and printed materials.
